scripts.git-config: test "$GITHUB_WORKFLOW" && git remote set-url --push origin "https://$GH_USER:$GITHUB_TOKEN@github.com/andrewbranch/definitely-not-slow" && git config --global user.name "$GH_USER" && git config --global user.email "$GH_EMAIL" || echo ''
scripts.push-production: git fetch && git checkout production && git merge -m 'Merge master into production' origin/master && npm run build && git add dist && git commit --allow-empty -m 'Update dist' && git push -u origin production && git checkout -
scripts.push-beta: git fetch && git checkout beta && git merge -m 'Merge master into beta' origin/master && npm run build && git add dist && git commit --allow-empty -m 'Update dist' && git push -u origin beta && git checkout -
